name: Elf Off The Shelf (UkeMan11)
description:
Elf off the shelf is a game I made for a weekly game jam called the tri-jam. In this game, you play as Santa, trying to wake up all of the sleepy elves on the shelves so that they switch places in the morning. you have to use boxes and terrain to move the elf around. This game was super fun to make, and I had to work super hard to get it done in three hours. 

PS, I tried to export it as a webgl file, but I couldn't seem to get it to work, so a download will have to do for now.
